text: The 36 - year - old racing driver was the first female host for the sports award show. Love is in the air. Danica Patrick and Aaron Rodgers couldn't keep their eyes off each other while they made their red carpet debut as a couple at the 2018 ESPY Awards at Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles on Wednesday. The 36 - year - old race car driver showed off her fit and toned figure in a one - shoulder black velvet mini dress that featured gold circular details. She paired the killer ensemble with black gladiator heels, soft makeup and her hair in a low ponytail. The Green Bay Packers quarterback looked suave in a navy tuxedo with black lapels and a white button - up shirt with a black bow - tie. The two looked so in love as they smiled at each other on the red carpet
